XII.ii.2.D.8.a
.
Handling 38 U.S.C. 1312(a) Disagreements
A disagreement with VA’s decision on a claim for benefits under
38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
must be submitted on an approved standardized decision review form.
Refer any protests regarding determinations made by SSA to the servicing SSA PSC and inform the claimant of the referral.
References
:  For more information on
the eligibility determinations made by VA or SSA, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.B
, and
appeal procedures, see
M21-5, Chapter 4
.
